subject: [Radiance-general] how to install
body:
Hi Imran,

If you downloaded the installer from the NREL page between June 16 and about an hour ago, I apologize ? that one was messed up. Please download the new version there now, and *follow* the instructions on the download page for setting your environment (PATH and RAYPATH), and you should be good to go.

https://openstudio.nrel.gov/getting-started-developer/getting-started-radiance

- Rob


Sent: Saturday, January 26, 2013 5:47 AM
To: radiance-general at radiance-online.org
Hello,
I have to install radiance, I installed radiance by downloading from http://www.radiance-online.org/download-install/installation-information/windows-installation. But it lacks a lot of things. Does anyone know how to install from source code? or is there any other proper windows install available?
Regards
Imran
